intro: Brachyscome bellidioides, commonly known as the narrowleaf starburry, is a flowering plant native to Australia. It belongs to the family Asteraceae, which includes daisies and sunflowers, and is characterized by its composite flower heads. The plant features small, star-shaped yellow flowers that bloom in summer, surrounded by pale green or white ray florets. It typically grows in sandy or gravelly soils and is often found in coastal regions. Brachyscome bellidioides is a low-growing perennial that is well adapted to arid and semi-arid environments.
